name: Garlic Bread
ingredients: 1-­‐2 tsp. parsley flakes or fresh chopped 1 large loaf of French Bread
2-­‐3 min, till edges are light brown. Watch carefully.
steps: Melt butter in a pan. Add parsley, onion salt, and garlic powder. Blend well (parsley will stay at the bottom of the
pan but can be spooned over bread). Cut bread lengthwise or in desired sizes. Bread can be dipped in butter or
butter spooned or brushed over it. Place in heavy pan. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Place under broiler for
